subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Reebok Canada is offering a $10,000 reward for the return of the stick and gloves Sidney Crosby used to score in overtime in Canada’s Olympic championship victory over the United States.
snippet: Reebok Canada is offering a $10,000 reward for the return of the stick and gloves Sidney Crosby used to score in overtime in Canada’s Olympic championship victory over the United States.
